steps.description: Cook spaghetti in salted boiling water until al dente.
Fry pancetta until crispy.
Whisk eggs and cheese together.
Combine spaghetti with pancetta and then add egg mixture quickly.
Marinate chicken in spices and yogurt for at least an hour.
Cook marinated chicken in a skillet until browned.
Prepare the sauce by simmering tomato puree and cream together.
Combine chicken and sauce, and cook for an additional 10 minutes.
Sauté sliced beef in a pan until browned.
Add mushrooms and cook until soft.
Stir in sour cream and simmer for a few minutes.
Serve over egg noodles.
Marinate pork in spices and pineapple juice overnight.
Cook marinated pork until tender and slice.
Assemble tacos with pork and toppings.
Serve with salsa and cilantro.
Chop all vegetables into small pieces.
Sauté vegetables in olive oil until soft.
Season with salt, pepper, and herbs.
Simmer until all vegetables are tender.
Sauté seafood in a large pan until just cooked.
Add rice and stir to coat.
Pour in broth and cook until rice is tender.
Let it rest for a few minutes before serving.
Slice eggplant and salt to draw out moisture.
Brown ground beef in a pan.
Layer eggplant, meat, and béchamel sauce in a baking dish.
Bake until golden brown.
Brown ground lamb in a skillet.
Prepare mashed potatoes with butter.
Layer ground lamb and top with mashed potatoes.
Bake until golden.
Brown chicken thighs in a pot.
Add red wine and simmer.
Add mushrooms and onions and cook until tender.
Serve hot with crusty bread.
Brown chuck roast in a pot.
Add onions and peppers and cook until softened.
Add broth and simmer until thickened.
Serve with bread or noodles.
Cut potatoes into chips and fry until golden.
Batter and fry the cod until crispy.
Serve hot with tartar sauce.
Soak chickpeas overnight and grind.
Mix with spices and form into balls.
Fry until golden brown.
Serve with tahini sauce.
Sauté onions and peppers in a skillet.
Add tomatoes and simmer until thickened.
Crack eggs into the sauce and cover until cooked.
Serve hot with bread.
Brown ground beef in a pot.
Add kidney beans and chili spices.
Simmer until flavors meld.
Serve hot with rice or cornbread.
Brown the chuck roast in a pot.
Add red wine and simmer.
Add mushrooms and onions and cook until tender.
Serve hot with bread.
Soak rice noodles in warm water.
Stir-fry shrimp until cooked.
Add noodles, sauce, and peanuts.
Serve hot with lime wedges.
Marinate pork in spices and skewers.
Grill skewers until cooked through.
Serve in pita bread with sauce.
Dice the fish and place it in a bowl.
Pour lime juice over the fish and let it marinate.
Add chopped onions and cilantro.
Serve chilled with tortilla chips.
Cook ramen noodles according to package instructions.
Heat the pork broth in a pot.
Add noodles to the broth and simmer.
Top with soft-boiled eggs and serve.
Prepare the duck and let it air dry.
Roast the duck until the skin is crispy.
Slice the duck and serve with pancakes and sauce.
Cook the meat sauce with spices.
Layer the pasta and sauce in a baking dish.
Bake until golden and bubbly.
Let it rest before serving.
Preheat the oven to 200°C (392°F).
Layer ham and cheese between slices of bread.
Toast in the oven until golden brown.
Serve hot with a side salad.
Boil the beetroot until tender.
Chop vegetables and sauté in a pot.
Add boiled beetroot and vegetable broth.
Simmer until all vegetables are cooked.
Prepare the dough and let it rest.
Cook the ground beef with spices.
Fill the dough with beef and seal.
Bake until golden brown.
Rinse the rice and set aside.
Prepare the tomato sauce by blending tomatoes.
Cook the rice in the tomato sauce and spices.
Simmer until the rice is cooked.
Bring chicken broth to a boil.
Add lemongrass and other herbs.
Add shrimp and cook until done.
Serve hot with lime and cilantro.
Pound the veal cutlets to flatten.
Dip in flour, then egg, and finally breadcrumbs.
Fry in hot oil until golden brown.
Serve with lemon wedges.
Fry the frozen French fries until golden and crispy.
Heat the beef gravy until hot.
Layer fries on a plate, pour gravy over them, and sprinkle cheese curds.
Serve immediately and enjoy.
Slice the eggplant and sprinkle with salt. Let it sit to remove bitterness.
Cook the ground lamb with spices until browned.
Layer eggplant, meat mixture, and pour bechamel sauce on top.
Bake until golden brown and set.
Brew a strong espresso and let it cool.
Mix mascarpone with sugar and eggs until smooth.
Dip ladyfingers in coffee and layer with mascarpone mixture.
Chill in the refrigerator for a few hours before serving.
